body.name: Digital Camera, FHD 1080P Camera, Digital Point and Shoot Camera with 16X Zoom Anti Shake, Compact Small Camera for Boys Girls Kids
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 59 mins
features: SHOOT DECENT IMAGES WITH EASE - The digital camera captures high-clarity FHD 1080P videos and 44MP photos with the newest CMOS metering system, no need for complicated manual settings while delivering natural color images automatically. One second to press the shutter, it's easy for starters and kids.

PORTABLE FOR TRAVEL & NICE BATTERY LIFE - The kids camera is a perfect everyday and take everywhere camera with it's petite body, durable, lightweight and small enough for your pocket. With two large capacity batteries, charging several times can last for one month. Plus, the automatic turn-off setting saves more energy in vacation trips and camping.

VERY EASY TO USE - Conducted with ergonomic design, from easy to access buttons to simple functions menu, the led fill light (shoot clear pictures in the dark) down to the large LCD display, a 5-13 years kid can easily figure out. Just install the SD card, battery, two seconds to turn it on, and freely capture all fun memories with friends, family.

ENCOURAGE CREATIVE - If you are tired of its automatic results, the point and shoot camera allows you to customize pictures. 16X zoom is great for photographing objects in the distance. 20 pcs creative filter effects to take Vintage photos, Black/White photos..., Anti shake, webcam, face and smile detection, continuous shooting, self-timer, waiting for you to explore them.

SUPERIOR SUPPORT FOR THIS GIFT - Backed by a one year hassle-free promise- refund and replacement. Digital camera, SD card, lanyard, storage bag, batteries, adapter, cable, exquisite box..., contains everything you need. It is a perfect gift for boys, girls, teens on birthdays, Christmas or any important events, a first real camera for kids who love to take videos and pictures.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Digital Camera for Photography ---Not for 2-3 years toddlers, we designed this 1080P digital camera for 4-10 years school children. Advantage Compared With Common Digital Cameras: Entry-level Photography Functions It has essential photography functions so for the children who are interested in photography, they can initially learn basic photography to record every happy moment at school, at home, or outdoors. Unique Shape Looks like a professional digital camera for adults but it' lighter, smaller and compactor. Children' hand can grasp it very well and carry it everywhere with the lanyard. Better Image Quality Advanced CMOS image sensor and Sony lens captures vivid and decent images, the built-in microphone will pick up clear audio, lets kids experience the feeling of a real photographer.

Video Recording This digital camera records FHD 1080P videos, its 2.5 inch LCD anti-blue light screen clearly shows the objects you capture while providing a good protection for kids eyes. Photos Shooting Advanced CMOS image sensor precisely focus on the onjects you want to shoot, High-precision chip responds quickly, capturing every wonderful moment for you. USB Transfer and Video Call Connect this camera directly to a computer and download the files to the desktop and share with your friends. You can also use it as a webcam to make a live streaming.

Portable for Trip The small travel camera has a super compact shape, makes it perfect everyday and takes the camera everywhere. It has a lanyard to carry conveniently and prevent from unexpected dropping. Easy to Operate The digital camera, made of durable premium materials, optimized the chips and structure to make it easier to figure out and setup while keeping the high-clarity and functionality as adult cameras. Contains Everything You Need Just insert the memory card and battery, and you can record your wonderful life immediately. It's ready to be gifted and brings unlimited photography fun for kids, teens and seniors who love to shoot videos and pictures.

One Button to Choose the Functions Rich Features With this Compact Camera, Easily to Create More Fuuny Videos and Pictures. Self Timer: 2S/5S/10S. Smile Capture: ON/OFF. Continuous Photos: Support. Face Detect: ON/OFF. Auto-Off: OFF/1minutes/3minutes/5minutes.

Smoothly zoom in or out, the objects will be magnified up to 16x, The childs will see an amazing tiny world. Anti Shake: ON/OFF. White Balance: Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Fluorescent. Charging Mode: Adapter（Not Included） + Type C cable (Included). Seller Tips: 1. Please format the SD card at the first time using, package includes a 32GB TF card. 2. We recomend this digital camera to 4-12 years old kids who want to learn simple photography, not for professional. 3. Please set the video resolution to 1080p and image resolution to 44MP to get a better image quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera! i bring it everywhere and it takes the best pictures. there are so many different features such as the different lighting, filters, flash, video mode, timer mode, and so many more. I love the color of the camera! I also love how they provide an sd card with the camera so you don’t have to order a seperate one! learning to use the camera was so easy and now i csnt go anywhere without it!! don’t think twice before you buy!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter, it was very easy to set up and use and she is very happy with the quality of the pictures. More durable than it looks, she dropped it a couple times and it still works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for convenience
reviews.reviewText: This camera is perfect for cheep little point and shoot. The image quality is great and it is durable so if the kiddos get ahold of it you are safe. It is fun and easy to use. The zoom aspect is great. I brought it to Costa Rica with me and captured amazing photos!! Easy to travel with :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently got the FHD 1080P Kids Camera, and it's been a delightful experience. The 44MP point-and-shoot feature is impressive, capturing vivid moments with clarity. It's user-friendly, making it perfect for kids. The camera's durability and vibrant colors make it a fantastic choice for young photographers. Overall, a fun and functional gadget for budding photographers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the first day using the camera was great, no problems! but the second day i started having problems with it constantly freezing whenever i tried to see the photos/videos i took, and i had to constantly take the battery out and put it back in. super annoying! BUT!!! if you’re having this problem, make sure you formatted the memory card!!!! unfortunately if you didn’t format it from the beginning, your photos/videos from before you formatted the memory card will be gone. but in my opinion i’d rather have a working camera than photos that i can’t even look at because of the constant freezing. i hope this helps someone cuz this was so frustrating for me!now on a more positive note.. after fixing this camera, it’s back to its original state! super cute and compact, very convenient for travel and gives a super cute 2000’s vibe with the photos. so far i haven’t had any problems with the battery life either! i definitely recommend this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this camera for my child, and I am incredibly impressed with its features and performance. The 44MP resolution ensures crisp and clear images, and the 16X zoom comes in handy for capturing distant subjects.The inclusion of a 32GB SD card was a thoughtful touch, providing ample storage for countless photos and videos. The two batteries are a lifesaver, ensuring that my child never misses a moment due to a dead battery.The compact design is perfect for little hands, and the lanyard adds an extra layer of security, preventing accidental drops. The user manual was straightforward, making it easy for my child to navigate through the camera's settings.I appreciate the variety of shooting modes available, allowing my child to get creative with their photography. It's a great way to introduce them to the world of photography while keeping things fun and engaging.Overall, this camera exceeded my expectations. It's a fantastic gift for young photographers, encouraging creativity and providing a platform for capturing precious memories. I highly recommend it to parents looking for a reliable and user-friendly camera for their kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best digital camera for beginners!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this digital camera to take along with me to trips and document my personal journey. I will say I love the quality of the camera as well as the size as it fits perfectly into my purse! There are multiple features on the camera which are amazing for the price. I love that I am able to captures videos in addition to photos. The flash feature is also delightful. I would highly recommend this digital camera for anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and versatile camera that exceeds my expectations.
reviews.reviewText: I'm delighted to share my positive experience with the FHD 1080P digital point and shoot camera with 16x zoom. The camera's high-definition resolution provides stunning clarity to my photos, and the 16x zoom capability allows me to capture detailed shots from a distance. Its user-friendly interface makes it easy to navigate, and the compact design enhances portability. Overall, it's a reliable and versatile camera that exceeds my expectations.
Tiene dos pilas recargables, correa, bolsita de almacenamiento, cargador y un trapito para limpiar solo que no sale en la foto gg, apenas la pondré a cargar pero se ve que si me servirá bien ❤️‍🩹
Terrible quality and felt very cheap for the price, do not buy

MALO. Los vídeos no graban sonido. Las fotos de super baja calidad. Simplemente al tocar el producto se siente barato. El flash es una burla de lo chafo que esta. En conclusión no tiren su dinero a la basura adquiriendo esta "CAMARA".

reviews.reviewTitle: nice cameria and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: it is really useful for little kids to take photo when playing outside. it is really easy to use this cameria and have a quality photos and vedios. Battery life is not bad. My daughter likes it very much. In a word, it is worthing money

How lovely the camera! Beautiful design, nice color. It is a very good size for my child. The instruction book is easy to understand, The camera is easy to use for my child. It can do both photos and videos. Most amazing things is the camera comes with 32GB card can record a lot of moments. We Love It so much!
